titles.title: Praise My Soul The King Of Heaven

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise my soul, the King of heaven; newline To His feet thy tribute bring; newline Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven, newline Evermore His praises sing: newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Praise the everlasting King!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Praise Him for His grace and favor newline To our fathers in distress. newline Praise Him, still the same forever. newline Slow to chide and swift to bless: newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Glorious in His faithfulness!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Father-like He tends and spares us. newline Well our feeble frame He knows; newline In His hands He gently bears us, newline Rescues us from all our foes: newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Widely yet His mercy flows!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Angels in the height, adore Him, newline Ye behold Him face to face; newline Sun and moon, bow down before Him, newline Dwellers all in time and space: newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Praise with us the God of grace!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Frail as summer's flow'r we flourish; newline Blows the wind and it is gone; newline But, while mortals rise and perish, newline God endures unchanging on: newline Praise Him, praise Him, newline Praise Him, praise Him, newline Praise with us the God of grace.
